Actually, it eventually completed after about 5 minutes (of no refresh). Very 
suspicious behavior.
Do you still have the source you were working on?

I released a fix for the NPE > 20021125

The slowness comes from jdt.text: On save 
MarkerHelpRegistry.hasResolutions
gets invoked.

The slowness comes from the unnessecary MarkerHelpRegistry.hasResolutions.
fixed in 20021204

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 27923 ***
